thread.title: Watch Kentucky Fans Go From Being Ecstatic To Dead Silent In A Matter Of A Few Seconds
thread.title_full: Watch Kentucky Fans Go From Being Ecstatic To Dead Silent In A Matter Of A Few Seconds

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Watch Kentucky Fans Go From Being Ecstatic To Dead Silent In A Matter Of A Few Seconds
text:
The ending of the Kentucky-North Carolina game was exhilarating. In a matter of a few seconds Kentucky went from tying to the game with a 3-pointer from Malik Monk only to see North Carolina hit a game-winner on the other end of the court. 
What just happened?!?!?! #Elite8 #MarchMadness pic.twitter.com/pGcdACCVRg 
— LeadingNCAA ™ (@LeadingNCAA) March 26, 2017 

We now have a real-time reaction video from Kentucky fans watching the ending of today’s Elite 8 game at a local bar and it’s amazing.
UK fans at the Tin Roof react in the seconds before the game expires. #Limestone #BBN pic.twitter.com/xXwk7YKw15 
— HLpublicsafety (@HLpublicsafety) March 26, 2017 

From 100 to 0 real quick.
